I am an Immigration Officer of the United States Immigration and Naturalization Service and desire to question you under oath concerning your status under the immigration laws of the United States. Any statements which you make must be voluntary and may be used by the Government as evidence in any deportation or criminal proceeding. Are you willing to make such a statement freely and voluntarily under oath? A. 2-Q.
